segments.text: Observing this indoor kitchen, it's detailed in line drawing style.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands by the sink, towel on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware of the faucet gushing water over the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills onto the floor, creating quite the spectacle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The two children are focused on the open cabinet instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, which catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching for her cookie, so coordinated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter, ready for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how all these elements coexist without notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
